attributes.additional_details: Make it illegal in any circumstances to profiteer, particularly shop / petrol station owners.

rejection.details:
We have published a petition calling on the Government to restrict people stockpiling and reselling items at inflated prices, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
